com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface Description<T extends ConstructorArg>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The object describing the parameters to be passed to the Buildable. How this is processed is described in the class level javadoc of ConstructorArgMarshaller.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FlavorableDescription<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidBinaryDescription, AndroidInstrumentationApkDescription, AndroidLibraryDescription, AndroidManifestDescription, AndroidResourceDescription, ApkGenruleDescription, AppleAssetCatalogDescription, BuckExtensionDescription, BuildConfigDescription, CppBinaryDescription, CppLibraryDescription, ExportFileDescription, GenAidlDescription, GenParcelableDescription, GenruleDescription, GwtBinaryDescription, IosBinaryDescription, IosLibraryDescription, IosResourceDescription, IosTestDescription, JavaBinaryDescription, JavaLibraryDescription, JavaTestDescription, KeystoreDescription, MacosxBinaryDescription, MacosxFrameworkDescription, NdkLibraryDescription, OsxResourceDescription, PrebuiltJarDescription, PrebuiltNativeLibraryDescription, ProjectConfigDescription, PythonBinaryDescription, PythonLibraryDescription, RobolectricTestDescription, ShBinaryDescription, ShTestDescription, XcodeNativeDescription, XcodeProjectConfigDescription, XcodeWorkspaceConfigDescription

    public interface Description<T extends ConstructorArg>
    The Source of Truth about a Buildable, providing mechanisms to expose the arguments that rules derived from the Buildable take and providing a factory for those Buildables. It is expected that instances of this class are stateless.

      • createUnpopulatedConstructorArg

        T createUnpopulatedConstructorArg()
        Returns:
        An instance of the argument that must later be passed to createBuildable(BuildRuleParams, ConstructorArg).

        ConstructorArgMarshaller

      • createBuildable

        <A extends T> Buildable createBuildable(BuildRuleParams params,
                                      A args)
        Parameters:
        args - A constructor argument, as returned by createUnpopulatedConstructorArg().
        Returns:
        The Buildable that describes the default flavour of the rule being described.
